title: How do you convert the tensor to a float
body_html:
🐛 Bug

error: invalid cast from type 'at::Tensor' to type 'std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}'
When I used the libtorch C++ API to do the test, after I got the variable tensor, I needed to print out every value of the variable. The C++ forced type conversion failed! How do I convert data types?

body:
## 🐛 Bug

<!-- error: invalid cast from type 'at::Tensor' to type 'std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}'. -->
`error: invalid cast from type 'at::Tensor' to type 'std::string {aka std::basic_string<char>}'`
When I used the libtorch C++ API to do the test, after I got the variable tensor, I needed to print out every value of the variable. The C++ forced type conversion failed! How do I convert data types?
